text: Nikos Skylakakis (; 22 June 1923 – 3 January 2023) was a Greek basketball player. He was a player of the Greece men's national basketball team and Panellinios B.C.. He later also played with Α.Ο. Triton. With the national team, he won the bronze medal at EuroBasket 1949. Skylakakis died in Athens on 3 January 2023, at the age of 99. ==References== Category:Greek basketball players Category:1923 births Category:2023 deaths Category:Sportspeople from Athens
title: Nikos Skylakakis
